taskDescription: * Source: Quantity of stuff in Source state
* Destination: Quantity of stuff in Destination state
Some problems do not need the Source node.
Popular names for this type of process:

givenModelNodes.name: Source
givenModelNodes.description: Quantity of stuff in the Source state

givenModelNodes.name: Changing
givenModelNodes.description: Quantity of stuff changing state per time unit

givenModelNodes.name: Destination
givenModelNodes.description: Quantity of stuff in the Destination state

givenModelNodes.name: Proportion changing
givenModelNodes.description: Proportion of Destination that change state per time unit
